mapper.select: SELECT seat.sid,seat.fid,seat.row,seat.leftside,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber,seat.statue FROM seat,floor WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) as num FROM booking WHERE booking.sid=seat.sid AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.bstime) )=0 AND seat.fid=floor.fid AND floor.statue=0 AND seat.statue=0 AND floor.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid

SELECT booking.bid,booking.sno,booking.bstime,booking.betime,booking.sid,booking.stime,booking.etime,booking.statue,booking.deal,seat.fid,seat.leftside,seat.row,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber FROM booking,seat WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.stime) AND booking.statue !=0 AND booking.statue !=3 AND booking.sid=seat.sid AND seat.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid

SELECT seat.sid,seat.fid,seat.row,seat.leftside,seat.columns,seat.seatnumber,seat.statue FROM seat,floor WHERE (SELECT COUNT(1) as num FROM booking WHERE booking.sid=seat.sid AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(booking.bstime)) > 0 AND seat.fid=floor.fid AND floor.statue=0 AND seat.statue=0 AND floor.fid=#{fid} ORDER BY seat.sid
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal FROM booking WHERE sid=#{sid} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(bstime) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(betime)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) > 0
SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal FROM booking WHERE sid=#{sid} AND TO_DAYS(NOW())+#{day}=TO_DAYS(bstime) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(betime)-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET stime=#{stime},statue=1 WHERE bid=#{bid}
UPDATE booking SET deal=#{deal},statue=#{statue} WHERE bid=#{bid}
mapper.select: SELECT bid,sno,bstime,betime,sid,stime,etime,statue,deal FROM booking WHERE sno LIKE '${sno}' AND TO_DAYS(NOW())+#{date}=TO_DAYS(bstime)
